H0.text: According to Latin grammatical rules what is the singular of candelabra. Candelabrum

H1.text: According to Latin grammatical rules what is the singular of candelabra. Candelaber

H2.text: According to Latin grammatical rules what is the singular of candelabra. Candela

H3.text: According to Latin grammatical rules what is the singular of candelabra. Candelabra

A4.text: candelabra is the correct plural form of candelabrum

A5.text: the word is originally Latin, where candēlābrum (candela, candle, -b(a) rum, holder) means a 'candlestick’
